post:
Zepto Hosting is a quickly growing virtual service provider. We provide services with 99.9% uptime at affordable prices.


OUR FEATURES

• Easy-to-use SolusVM Control Panel
• Instant Setup
• Quick Support
• Kansas City, MO Datacenter
• 1Gb/S Connection Port
• All VPSes come with at least 1 IPV4 and 5 IPV6 IPs
• Access to PPP and TUN/TAP from SolusVM Control Panel
• PayPal and Payza payment gateways. (2Checkout coming soon...)

OUR PLANS

★ Starter ★
Memory (RAM):128MB
Disk Space: 10GB
Bandwidth: 250GB (Monthly)
Port Speed: 1Gb per Second
IPV4 IPs: 1
IPV6 IPs: 5
CPU Cores: 1

All of this for $1.50 /month 

★ Basic ★

Memory (RAM): 512MB
Disk Space: 30GB
Bandwidth: 500GB (Monthly)
Port Speed: 1Gb per Second
IPV4 IPs: 1
IPV6 IPs: 5
CPU Cores: 1
All of this for $5.50 /month 

More prices and plans on our website: https://zeptohosting.com/vpshosting.php

PAYMENT GATEWAYS

We accept the following payment methods for transactions:

 PayPal
 Visa
 Mastercard
 Payza
 COMING SOON: 2Checkout

CONTACT US

You may contact us any time with query's or asking for support. Only submit your request to ONE of these methods.
• If you are logged into the Client Area, submit a ticket
• Shoot support an email at support@zeptohosting.com
• Add i-xodia on Skype and ask your question.
